snippet: The misdemeanor arrest of the rebellious rapper at the Sierra Blanca highway checkpoint near El Paso on Saturday might not be newsworthy in and of itself, except that Mr. Nelson was also arrested there in 2010.
abstract: The misdemeanor arrest of the rebellious rapper at the Sierra Blanca highway checkpoint near El Paso on Saturday might not be newsworthy in and of itself, except that Mr. Nelson was also arrested there in 2010.

headline.main: Snoop Dogg Busted at Same Border Crossing That Snared Willie Nelson
headline.print_headline: Snoop Dogg Follows Willie Nelson’s Path
